page_content:
Accenture (UK) Limited

Accenture Cloud Infrastructure Services

Accenture helps clients with a phased, end-to-end transformational approach to create an optimised IT infrastructure. Recognised by analysts as “Leaders” in Cloud Professional Services, Accenture has the skills, experience and offerings to reduce costs and increase productivity. The Next Generation Data Centre provides the architectural blueprint for cloud computing transformation.

Features

  • Review and recommendation on standardisation of technology, tools and processes
  • Integration and automation of both technology and IT processes
  • Service Orientation linking operations to business services provisioned on cloud
  • Data Centre Optimisation: consolidating data centre footprints
  • Server Optimisation: centralise, standardise and consolidate organisation's existing servers
  • Storage Transformation: transition to networked storage and eliminate duplicate environments
  • Database Optimisation: improve IT productivity, reduce total cost of ownership.
  • Data Centre Automation of server, storage and applications
  • Data Centre Outsourcing: secure, stable for development and production hosting
  • Storage services, database management and application technical services

Benefits

  • Proven tools and methodologies help to ensure quality and predictability.
  • Business Service Management manages end-to-end services to business outcomes
  • Process automation links provisioning to capacity and service level objectives
  • Integrated operations framework transformed from reactive to proactive to predictive
  • Dynamic Provisioning techniques that address heterogeneous and virtualised infrastructure
  • Pooled resources with virtualisation of server, storage, network and security
  • Highly skilled onshore resources with industry specific knowledge.
  • Assets and accelerators to reduce cost and timescales

Pricing

£815 per person per day

  • Excluding VAT
  • Termination costs apply
  • Minimum contract period: Other
